column4: well I don't mind testing out Natty, but I need to solve my USB modem firstly
.....by the way I have a Franklin Wireless U600 3G/4G USB Modem, is there a solution to run it on Ubuntu
if some one can nelp me out with this, I'll be greatful
did you tried to configure in network manager? i take it that you tried but the modem was not listed?
